name: Indiana Stallone and the Paper of Truth
name_original: Indiana Stallone and the Paper of Truth
description:
REMARK

Maybe we have accidentally placed an instance of the "Holy Paper" at the start of the first level. *coughcough*. Of course this was not intended and will disappear in the following version..

Play as our all biggest hero, Indiana Stallone. Fight your way through an ancient pyramid to find mankind's biggest treasure, the Holy Paper.

How to play

You and your weapon are on a common adventure to find the legendary "Paper of Truth". To find it you have to fight your way through the watchers of this sacred artifact.

Controls

WASD/Arrows - Moves your Character
Left Mouse Click - Fires your weapon
